name: Escape From The Labyrinth
description:
This videogame has been created for blind people (for that reason you only will see a black screen). It's only avaliable for controller. You will have to reach the end of the labyrinth. 

If you listen a trap or nuclear alarm sound you have to wait. 

Actions:

  • Left joystick: move player
  • Right joystick: rotate camera (90 degrees every time you move the joystick)
  • Button A: return to last checkpoint
